sentences.sentence: She took a massive overdose of sleeping pills.
sentences.translation: 她服用了过量的安眠药。

sentences.sentence: Each year, one in 100 girls ages 15-19 takes an overdose.
sentences.translation: 每年，100个15至19岁的女孩中就有１个用药过量。

sentences.sentence: Whatever happens, never take an overdose of this medicine.
sentences.translation: 这种药千万不能服过量。
